  • Method Details

    • canMove

      public static boolean canMove(float x, float y, Rectangle2D.Float touchBox, List<Rectangle2D.Float> obstacles)
      Decides if creature can move x to the right and y down.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the point to move.
      y - y coordinate of the point to move.
      touchBox - touch box of the creature.
      obstacles - obstacles in the current room.
      Returns:
      true if creature can move, else false.

    • countDistance

      public static int countDistance(Point point1, Point point2)
      Counts distance between two points.
      Parameters:
      point1 - first point.
      point2 - second point.
      Returns:
      distance between two points.

    • generateItemByType

      public static void generateItemByType(Constants.ItemTypes type, Point dropPoint)
      Generate item in the current room on the given point.
      Parameters:
      type - type of generated item.
      dropPoint - point where the center of the item's touch box will be placed.

    • isMouseOverButton

      public static boolean isMouseOverButton(Button button, MouseEvent e)
      Decides if mouse is over the particular button.
      Parameters:
      button - particular button.
      e - mouse event, from which coordinates will be taken.
      Returns:
      true if mouse coordinates intersects with button hit box.

    • buttonReleased

      public static void buttonReleased(Button button, boolean condition)
      Does "mouse released over the button" action.
      Parameters:
      button - button which will be activated, if condition is true.
      condition - condition for button activation.

    • drawNumber

      public static void drawNumber(Graphics g, int number, float numberX, float numberY, float numberWidth, float numberHeight, float betweenNumbers)
      Draws two-digit number on given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      g - object for drawing.
      number - two-digit number to draw.
      numberX - x coordinate of first digit.
      numberY - y coordinate of first digit.
      numberWidth - width of one digit (in pixels).
      numberHeight - height of one digit (in pixels).
      betweenNumbers - number of pixels between two digits.

    • countFiles

      public static int countFiles(File folder)
      Counts serialized (.ser) files in the given folder.
      Parameters:
      folder - folder with serialized files.
      Returns:
      count of serialized files.
